column1: '''Fang''' was one of the guard [[Dogs|dogs]] of [[Farmer Maggot]]'s [[Bamfurlong]]. Fang was one of the three large
These ferocious but well-trained animals lived at his farm at the time of the [[War of the Ring]]
column2: but he had evidently kept other dogs before these. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] had frightening memories of Maggot's dogs going back some thirty years
column3: but the dogs that had threatened him three decades earlier could hardly have been Fang

column1: Fang means "canine tooth" but was also an archaic English verb meaning "[[grip]]".<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}
